short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple time tracker for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with Yudoo Time Tracker, a Google Chrome extension for professionals who need precision in tracking their time. Ideal for web developers, content writers, designers, solicitors, and more, Yudoo lets you run multiple timers simultaneously, empowering you to handle diverse tasks efficiently. Its unique feature allows grouping of timers, providing a structured view of time spent on different project aspects. Analyze your time allocation, identify bottlenecks, and optimize workflow. Yudoo is user-friendly, easily integrated into your workspace, and respects your privacy with local data storage. Unlock the path to enhanced productivity and efficiency with Yudoo Time Tracker - your trusted companion in effective time management.
